UFC - 01:30 am UFC 196 Early Prelims

regex.name: URLEncodedLink
regex.expres: $pyFunction:urllib.quote_plus('$doregex[decodedUrl]$doregex[token]|Referer=http://cdn.webplayer.pw/jwplayer.flash.swf&User-Agent=Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0 Iceweasel/41.0.2')

regex.name: token
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0 Iceweasel/41.0.2

regex.name: get-encodeUrl
regex.agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11 Linux i686 rv:41.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/41.0 Iceweasel/41.0.2
